select count(no) cnt from board where is_notice=false
and subject like '%${searchWord}%'
select no, subject, userid, content, date_format(write_date,'%y-%m-%d %H:%i') write_date, is_notice from board where no=${no}
select no, subject, userid, date_format(write_date,'%y-%m-%d %H:%i') write_date, is_notice from board where is_notice=true order by no desc limit ${param1}
